LanguageData.BuildSP.label: Build Sturer Survival Pistol
LanguageData.BuildSP.description: Build a Sturer Survival Pistol, guess you really need one of those.\nCaliber: Most Rifle Caliber
LanguageData.BuildSR.label: Build Medusa Survival Revolver
LanguageData.BuildSR.description: Build a Medusa Survival Revolver, make every shot count!\nCaliber: Most Pistol Caliber
LanguageData.BuildC96M.label: Build Mauser C96 Pistol
LanguageData.BuildC96M.description: Build a Mauser C96 Pistol, a very popular pistol in certain Asian Country.\nCaliber: 7.63x25mm Mauser / 9x19mm Parabellum / .45 ACP.
LanguageData.BuildM712S.label: Build M712 "Schnellfeuer" Pistol
LanguageData.BuildM712S.description: Build a M712 "Schnellfeuer" Pistol, now you can have an automatic "Broomhandle".\nCaliber: 7.63x25mm Mauser / 9x19mm Parabellum / .45 ACP
